note.p: Death: 13 Wilbury Villas, Hove, Sussex (09 February 1925)

Career: Settled in England; Assistant to John Burdon Sanderson (FRS 1867), Brown Institution (1871); Assistant Professor in the Brown Institution; Lecturer in General Histology, St Bartholomew's Hospital Medical School, London (from 1872); studied cholera in India (1885); undertook work in bacteriology for the Local Government Board
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1925 vol 98 pp xxv-xxix signed by F W A
Notes: TR and YB give year of birth as 1845.
